paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician, Al-taschith, A Psalm or Song of Asaph.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician, Al-taschith, A Psalm or Song of Asaph.

paragraphs.content: Unto thee, O God, do we give thanks, unto thee do we give thanks: for that thy name is near thy wondrous works declare.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Unto thee, O God, do we give thanks, unto thee do we give thanks: for that thy name is near thy wondrous works declare.

paragraphs.content: When I shall receive the congregation I will judge uprightly.
paragraphs.contentHtml: When I shall receive the congregation I will judge uprightly.

paragraphs.content: The earth and all the inhabitants thereof are dissolved: I bear up the pillars of it. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The earth and all the inhabitants thereof are dissolved: I bear up the pillars of it. Selah.

paragraphs.content: I said unto the fools, Deal not foolishly: and to the wicked, Lift not up the horn:
paragraphs.contentHtml: I said unto the fools, Deal not foolishly: and to the wicked, Lift not up the horn:

paragraphs.content: Lift not up your horn on high: speak not with a stiff neck.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Lift not up your horn on high: speak not with a stiff neck.

paragraphs.content: For promotion cometh neither from the east, nor from the west, nor from the south.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For promotion cometh neither from the east, nor from the west, nor from the south.

paragraphs.content: But God is the judge: he putteth down one, and setteth up another.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But God is the judge: he putteth down one, and setteth up another.

paragraphs.content: For in the hand of the LORD there is a cup, and the wine is red; it is full of mixture; and he poureth out of the same: but the dregs thereof, all the wicked of the earth shall wring them out, and drink them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For in the hand of the Lord there is a cup, and the wine is red; it is full of mixture; and he poureth out of the same: but the dregs thereof, all the wicked of the earth shall wring them out, and drink them.

paragraphs.content: But I will declare for ever; I will sing praises to the God of Jacob.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But I will declare for ever; I will sing praises to the God of Jacob.

paragraphs.content: All the horns of the wicked also will I cut off; but the horns of the righteous shall be exalted.
paragraphs.contentHtml: All the horns of the wicked also will I cut off; but the horns of the righteous shall be exalted.
